list.abs: pome grows ellipsoidal form , long 10-15 centimeter , deep yellow , provide burnish , pulp woodiness , flavour small acid , acerbity , have scent , have short fruit stem .梨果长椭圆体形,长10-15厘米,深黄色,具光泽,果肉木质,味微酸.涩,有芳香,具短果梗。
